high_temp_low_moisture.description: High temperature & low soil moisture requires irrigation
high_temp_low_moisture.recommendation: Schedule irrigation within 12 hours to reduce heat stress

extreme_heat_any_crop.description: Extreme heat (>35°C) causes immediate water stress in all crops
extreme_heat_any_crop.recommendation: Urgent irrigation required to prevent crop dehydration

crop_specific_low_moisture.description: Soil moisture has dropped below crop-specific minimum threshold
crop_specific_low_moisture.recommendation: Moisture levels are below optimal. Irrigate according to crop requirement.

rice_frequent_irrigation.description: Rice requires very high moisture; check ponding if moisture <50%
rice_frequent_irrigation.recommendation: Paddy fields must maintain 5–7 cm water. Irrigate immediately.

moderate_temp_low_moisture.description: Moderate temperature but moisture low – irrigation needed soon
moderate_temp_low_moisture.recommendation: Monitor soil moisture closely and irrigate within 24 hours.
